Good Comments: Stepped in when others wouldn't. Not a terrible first effort. Decent raw. Room for improvement.
Stepped up and subbed something others wouldn't.  Not bad for a first try, though some of the TL notes weren't needed.  Good quality video with good font/size and decent translations.
Bad Comments: Encoded very badly. The MKV file wont play in my player and I've never had problems before.
Lots of translation errors. And I mean lots of them. Like, three jokes in the anime suddenly make no sense because of GC's translation. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
